capability.name: Regulatory Reporting
capability.definition: This service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to meet the bank's regulatory reporting obligations
capability.role: The service domain handles the bank's regulatory reporting obligations. This includes the consolidation and presentation of information in regulatory reports and disclosures and handling the response to regulatory requests for information as part of ongoing regulator relations. It also handles the scheduled consolidation, formatting and delivery of the range of compliance reports including 'on-line' trade reporting and after the event transaction analysis reporting
capability.example: Trading activity is reported to the exchange to comply with regulatory reporting requirements

key_features.name: Consolidate regulatory reporting materials and assemble reports
key_features.description: Enables consolidate regulatory reporting materials and assemble reports to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to meet the bank's regulatory reporting obligations

key_features.name: Delivery scheduled and ad-hoc reports to regulators
key_features.description: Enables delivery scheduled and ad-hoc reports to regulators to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to meet the bank's regulatory reporting obligations

key_features.name: Handle regulator's reporting requests and responses
key_features.description: Enables handle regulator's reporting requests and responses to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to meet the bank's regulatory reporting obligations

key_features.name: Oversee on-line/production transaction regulatory reporting
key_features.description: Enables oversee on-line/production transaction regulatory reporting to support this service domain administers and orchestrates the tasks required to meet the bank's regulatory reporting obligations
